sub _default
A catch-all routine for otherwise unhandled events that POE might see.
Calculates the difference between now and a timestamp, and returns a nicely formatted output
sub cmd_exists_in_db
Checks if a command already exists in the modules-table
Colorifies a string
sub delete
Deletes a key from object and database, if it exists.
sub DESTROY
Disconnects a database-handle when it goes out of scope.
sub do_autoping()
Called by the POE-kernel when there has been no traffic for 300 seconds.
sub do_connect()
Initiates a connection to the IRC-server through the previously defined IRC-object
sub do_reconnect()
Called when a connection is dropped and needs to be re-established.
sub dummy
Do I really need to do this?
sub empty_db
Removes all commands from the command-table.
Colorifies an error-message
sub execute
Scans the command-table for commands matching the provided message.
sub exists
Checks if a configuration key have been set (exists in the configuration table)
sub get
Get the value of a key.
sub irclog
DEPRECATED! 
sub load
Takes a module-name or a filename and scans for a module with that name in Anna’s module-directories.
Trims whitespace from the beginning of a string
sub module_loaded
Checks if a module with the supplied name has already been loaded
sub new
Generate a new configuration-object
sub new
Instance-method that return a plain database-handle
sub new
Returns an instance of Anna::Log, which allows for logging to that specific location.
sub new
Create new instance of Anna::Module.
sub on_ctcp_finger
Technically supposed to be a finger-implementation but that’s boring, so respond with a rude remark instead.
sub on_ctcp_ping
Event callback called by POE when a CTCP PING is recieved.
sub on_ctcp_time
Event callback called by POE when a CTCP TIME is recieved.
sub on_ctcp_version
Event callback called by POE when a CTCP VERSION is recieved.
sub on_ctcpreply_ping
Event callback called by POE when a CTCP PING reply is recieved.
sub on_ctcpreply_version
Event callback called by POE when a CTCP VERSION reply is recieved.
sub parse_configfile
Parses a configuration file and updates config-table with new keys and values.
Formats the current time for displaying purposes (command line, in IRC, etc)
sub registercmd
Used as a method to register a command
Trims whitespace off the end of a string
sub set
Sets a given key to a given value
sub sync
Synchronizes an older version of Anna’s database to the current version.
sub toggle
Toggles a boolean value (set it to zero if it’s one and vice-versa)
Trims whitespace off the start and end of a string
sub unload
Unloads a module (for now, just deletes the commands associated with that module-name
sub usage
Prints usage information and quits
sub version
Prints version information to stdout
Colorifies a warning
sub write
An instance-method that operates on log-instances.
